sections.title: Introduction & Context Setting
sections.goal: Establish the candidate's understanding of the Nimbus Observability project's objectives, constraints, and alignment with company values.
sample_questions: Can you summarize your understanding of the Nimbus Observability project's scope and its role in our platform ecosystem?
How do you see the 'Safety First' and 'Sustainable Velocity' values influencing observability pipeline design?
What are the key deliverables in the Build phase for a project of this nature?

sections.title: Technical Implementation Details
sections.goal: Assess hands-on experience with OpenTelemetry pipelines, SLO definitions, and integration with incident analytics.
sample_questions: Walk me through how you would set up an OpenTelemetry collector for multi-service ingestion.
How would you ensure SLOs are accurately measured and aligned with SLA-ORI-02 for downstream systems?
Describe a time you automated an observability deployment pipeline with IaC; what tools and patterns did you use?

sections.title: Cross-System Dependencies
sections.goal: Evaluate ability to identify and manage dependencies with other portfolio projects and departments.
sample_questions: How might the Nimbus Observability pipeline need to integrate with Mercury Messaging's exactly-once semantics?
If the Atlas Mobile app's feature flags cause variable traffic patterns, how would you adjust sampling strategies (see RFC-1114)?
Can you describe a scenario where observability data feeds into FinOps guardrails in Vesta?

sections.title: Incident Response & Runbooks
sections.goal: Test knowledge of incident triage, alert fatigue management, and runbook utilization.
sample_questions: How would you use RB-OBS-033 to tune alerts to reduce noise without missing critical incidents?
Give an example of a high-severity incident where observability data directly shortened MTTR.
What unwritten heuristics do you apply when deciding to escalate an anomaly?

sections.title: Decision-Making, Risks & Tradeoffs
sections.goal: Understand approach to balancing performance, cost, and reliability in observability systems.
sample_questions: If faced with a tradeoff between higher sampling rates and increased storage costs, how would you decide?
What risks do you foresee in deploying new trace sampling strategies across all services simultaneously?
Can you reference an RFC or SLA that would guide your decision in such a tradeoff?

sections.title: Closing & Reflection
sections.goal: Gauge cultural fit, reflective learning, and alignment with project trajectory.
sample_questions: Looking back, what would you improve in your last observability deployment?
How do you keep up with evolving best practices in cloud-native observability?
Any questions for us about the Nimbus Observability roadmap?
